info.title: Rest API
info.description:
This component service is about to manage security and user management flow and it can apply with GAE and none-GAE Platform. 

There are 3 types of Authentication we currently support :

1- oAuth2 Client Credentials flow (Minimum that every App must use & Third Party Systems that integrate into backend)
2- oAuth2 Resource Owner Password flow (Username, password) - To use this type, it must pass access_token from 1- oAuth2 Client Credentials  
3- oAuth2 Authorization Code (Social Integration, e.g., Facebook, Twitter, etc.)

post.description: Designed for admin user who has ROLEs ROLE_ADMIN and ROLE_BACKOFFICE to create new user with type client_credentials. This new user is used by 3rd-party app. Successful response will be httpStatus OK. The created user will have role ROLE_USER, ROLE_USER_CREDENTIALS.

parameters.name: clientId
parameters.description: username for user to be created

403.description: You are unauthorized for this action

get.description: Retrieves list of users with paginated result.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
user type to apply as filter. Values are:
  • 1 - type resource password owner;
  • 2 - client_credentials;
  • 3 - socialType.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: cursor to access next page. for none-gae cursor is offset int value , for gae is cursor string value

403.description: You are unauthorized for this action
You are unauthorized for this action

parameters.name: state
parameters.description:
State of user long value:

  • 1 - active

parameters.name: maxCacheAge
parameters.description: Optional. Decides the value the Cache-Control header sent back end the response.            Default value is 1 day.            Set the 0 if set the cache directive to "no-cache" to avoid the http client            to do any caching.

parameters.name: asAttachment
parameters.description: Optional. Set the Content-Disposition header to decide if the file            should be returned as an attachment. Default is false.

parameters.description: Optional. The url that Blobstore should use as callback url.            Only set this values if you want a specific handled method to run            after a file upload (when default behaviour is not enough)

403.description: You are unauthorized for this action

post.description:
Registers new user as user type resources owner password . when user calls this API, the user will have two ROLEs: ROLE_USER and, ROLE_USER_PASSWORD.

If there are some extra fields to store as well such as first name, last name, date of birth and others. Your backend needs to have one listener implementation. Extra fields will manage in backend project
The user-security-mgmt will store only username and password.

There are 2 methods in this listener ( pre & after Process).

1 -preProcess() : may be used for validation request params or other purposes
2 -afterPorcess() : save your extra fields into other entity (Profile entity) of backend project.

How to integration from backend project :

  • create a new Listener implemented (UserAccountListener) from UserListener
  • implementation preProcess & afterProcess methods
  • declare UserAccountController as autoWired tag in MvcConfig or you can do in xml configuration
  • set listener in securityModule() method: userAccountController.setListener(new UserAccountListener());
  • see more details in template-gae-backend or template-backend

When activation account feature is used, the response in json format will not expose accessToken value at all.

Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username for login value is email address

parameters.name: appType
parameters.description:
Application type which is used to generate deep link send in email content to activate account.
This param depends on state param value. If state is pending then appType has to present in the request.
If your project does not need feature activate account please ignore this param and state param. Here are possible Values:
  • 1 - for iOS
  • 2 - for Android
  • 3 - for web

post, get.description: Activate account confirmation for user type resource owner password.

parameters.name: autoLogin
parameters.description:
boolean flag after activating account it should auto-login or not by default it istrue.
If this flag is false then the server will return empty json back.

403.description: You are unauthorized for this action

get.description:
Log-out command for all oAuth flows. Remove session token. There are 2 methods in this listener ( pre & after Process). with actionName = "logout"

1 -preProcess() : may be used for validation request params or other purposes
2 -afterPorcess() : after logout action you can do extra task ex : unsubscribe notification

Verifies user account login with type client credentials type.

It's required to send request Header Authorization ex: Authorization Basic clientId:clientSecret
post.summary: [ROLE_ANONYMOUS] authenticate with oAuth2 Client Credentials flow

403.description: You are unauthorized for this action

post.description:
Verifies user account login with type resources owner password.
To pass this request you need to pass authentication by user type credentials first otherwise response back 401.
There is one listener added in this API, there are 2 two methods (pre & after Process) to be invoked.

1 -preProcess() : may be used for validation request params or other purposes
2 -afterPorcess() : after login successfully, this method will be called and backend project

If you need to enable this listener, you may implement this listener in your backend integration.
How to integration from backend project :

  • create a new Listener ex: (Oauth2LoginListener) implemented from UserListener
  • implement on preProcess & afterProcess methods
  • declare OAuth2Controller as autoWired tag in MvcConfig or you can do in xml configuration
  • set listener in securityModule() method: OAuth2Controller.setListener(new Oauth2LoginListener());
  • see more details in template-gae-backend or template-backend
This feature is available from version 2.0.44 to up In case your application uses non standard authentication identity (phone, phoneId, ..) listener could "resolve" it by putting "realIdentity" parameter into request. This is how your listener implementation could look like 
        public void preProcess(HttpServletRequest request, String actionName) {            if ("loginWithUserResourcesOwnerType".equals(actionName)) {                String customIdentity = request.getParameter("username");                if (isPhone(username)) {                    String username = profileService.getUsernameByPhone(custmoIdentity);                    request.setAttribute("realIdentity",username);                } else if (isTwitterId(username)) {                    String username = profileService.getUsernameByTwitter(custmoIdentity);                    request.setAttribute("realIdentity",username);                }            }        }
After that realIdentity would be used as a username
post.summary: [ROLE_USER] authenticate with oAuth2 Resource Owner Password flow

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username for login value is email address

403.description: You are unauthorized for this action

post, get.description:
Registers SocialAccount Type with our service.

To pass this request you need to pass authentication by user type credentials first otherwise response back 401

There is one listener added in this API, there are 2 two methods (pre & after Process) to be invoked.

1 -preProcess() : may be used for validation request params or other purposes
2 -afterPorcess() : after login successfully, this method will be called and backend project

If you need to enable this listener, you may implement this listener in your backend integration.
How to integration from backend project :

  • create a new Listener ex: (Oauth2LoginListener) implemented from UserListener
  • implement on preProcess & afterProcess methods
  • declare OAuth2Controller as autoWired tag in MvcConfig or you can do in xml configuration
  • set listener in securityModule() method: OAuth2Controller.setListener(new Oauth2LoginListener());
  • see more details in template-gae-backend or template-backend
This feature is available from version 2.0.48 to up
response Http Status code '201'- first time login,
response Http Status code '200'- second time login, response Http Status code '201'- first time login, response Http Status code '200'- second time login,
post, get.summary: [ROLE_ANONYMOUS] authenticate with oAuth2 Social Integration flow

parameters.name: providerId
parameters.description: social type such as: facebook, google, twitter

403.description: You are unauthorized for this action

get.description:
Refreshes token acts as Remember Me Functionality: just call once per day.

When this method is called, it will set expires time on the token to 60 days after calling this method. The App is expected to invoke this method no more frequently than once a day or the next time the User uses the app if after more than one day.

This method s used for user type: resource owner password and client credentials.



The success json response only field AccessToken.expiresIn will be populated ex : {expiresIn:LongInMillisValue}

403.description: You are unauthorized for this action
